trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the specified token request (RST) is not understood because of an unknown token type.
trans-unit.target: 由于未知的令牌类型而无法识别指定的令牌请求 (RST) 时，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The RST is represented by a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken> object.
trans-unit.target: 由表示 RST<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken>对象。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性为系统提供的消息的描述错误的新实例。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示新实例的初始属性的值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|An empty string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。 | |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|空字符串。 |</xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref> class with the specified token type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref>使用指定的令牌类型的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the TokenType property to the specified token type URI and the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化为指定的令牌类型 URI 的 TokenType 属性和<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性为系统提供的消息的描述错误的新实例。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示新实例的初始属性的值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|The specified token type URI.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。 | |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|指定的令牌类型 URI。 |</xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the token type URI.
trans-unit.target: 包含令牌类型 URI 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>保存的序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains the contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>对象，其中包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回传递到构造函数的相同值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示新实例的初始属性的值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|`null`.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 | |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|`null`.|</xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A></xref:System.Exception.Message%2A></xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>导致当前异常。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If the `exception` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`exception`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the unsupported token type and other exception information.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>带有不受支持的令牌类型和其他异常信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: GetObjectData sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData 集<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>用针对于序列化的所有异常对象数据。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the exception object is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化期间的异常对象重建从<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>通过流传输。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>保存的序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains the contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>对象，其中包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the unsupported token type URI.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置不受支持的令牌类型 URI。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the unsupported token type URI.
trans-unit.target: 包含不受支持的令牌类型 URI 的字符串。
